comments:
When starting g-Eclipse I get a couple of NullPointerExceptions from the JobStatusUpdater:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at eu.geclipse.core.JobStatusUpdater.run(JobStatusUpdater.java:25)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
	
This issue may be related to bug #188296. Nevertheless it is a good idea to do a test against NULL at JobStatusUpdater.java:25. Furthermore I suggest moving the JobStatusUpdater in another package. I see two possibilities:

1) eu.geclipse.core.model.impl if the class has to be accessible from other plugins, too
2) eu.geclipse.core.internal.model if the class is internal for the core
